string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: "What are Durins folk, more commonly known as?"
Who partecipate in the Battle of Isengard?
What is the name of the Uruk-hai leader, second only to Saruman?
How many are the original members of the Fellowship?
Which is the name of Gandalf white horse?

string-array.name: answers
string-array.item: The name given to an Elf who has given up its immortality.
The corrupt mounds of earth from which Uruk-hai are born.
